data.title: Retirement tax breaks benefit higher earners, leaving middle-class savers behind, report finds
data.description: Tax breaks designed to boost retirement savings may primarily benefit higher earners, leaving middle-class workers behind, according to a report.

data.title: Historical emissions caused the climate crisis. But it's what we do today that will make or break it, study shows
data.description: A study found that there is now a 42% chance that the world may already be locked in to at least 1.5 degrees C of warming above pre-industrial levels, even if emissions are halted today.

data.title: Opinion: Gen Zers, don't believe the love-work hype
data.description: In the past month, millions of college students have been graduating and entering the American workforce. Steve Jobs' well-known advice to the Stanford class of 2005, "find what you love ... and love what you do," has now become the accepted gospel among the college-educated workforce.

data.description: Jim Cramer, host of CNBC's "Mad Money" and Investing Club, shares his advice for finding high-growth stocks like Tesla or Alphabet.

data.title: Advice for the class of 2022: What new graduates need to know about money and jobs
data.description: Transitioning from school to the adult world of work and money isn't necessarily easy.
